title: Power Analysis: Pogačar’s Power Numbers Are the Highest We’ve Ever Seen in Professional Cycling
content:
In this column, we dive into the power numbers of Tadej Pogačar, Jonas Vingegaard, and more at the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Power Analysis: Pogačar’s Power Numbers Are the Highest We’ve Ever Seen in Professional Cycling on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
